stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Forum Thread Leads to Fiesta Landing Site and ZeroAccess Trojan
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 31 October 2013, a forum thread injector or a malvertizement redirected a user to a Fiesta Exploit Kit landing site. This site downloaded a ZeroAccess Trojan.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
This URL is redirected from the referrer URL: www.ifish.net/board/showthread.php?t=108825
This malicious URL goes to a Fiesta Exploit Kit landing page which downloads a ZeroAccess Trojan
This file is a ZeroAccess Trojan.
